name: Smartwool Hike Light Park Explorer Pattern Crew Socks - Unisex
categories: Hike Light Park Explorer Pattern Crew Socks
description: Explore Canadian parks big and small with comfy feet. The flat-knit toe seam keeps your toes comfortable and the arch brace prevents bunching.Made of soft merino wool and synthetic blend.Arch brace holds sock securely in place.Flat-knit toe seam doesn't cause hotspots or chafing.
